definitions.definition: Having existed for so great a period of time that its longevity cannot be expressed.
examples: The ageless pyramids stood prominently against the sunset.
This memorial will show our ageless respect to those who died.

definitions.definition: Always appearing youthful ; never seeming to age .

main_definition: ( relative to past ) Having existed for so great a period of time that its longevity cannot be expressed.
secondary_definitions: ( relative to future ) Continuing infinitely or indefinitely.
Always appearing youthful ; never seeming to age .
